messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion]
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/13/2003 3:41:43 PM Mountain Daylight Time, ... Sue, this list has been so still for two days people thought it was broken. If you re in a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/13/2003 3:41:43 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
sue@... writes:

> I'm really bad at introductions and stuff, but I thought I'd say hi. The
> name is Sue, and I live in the city of Philadelphia. I've been lurking
> aroudn for a while, and I'm looking forward to learning more about
> unschooling.
>

Sue, this list has been so still for two days people thought it was broken.

If you're in a hurry, here are some repositories of Stuff by various
unschoolers:


<A HREF="www.unschooling.com">www.unschooling.com</A> (go to message boards, and then to the box at the
bottom, and click newmessages)

<A HREF="http://sandradodd.com/unschooling">http://sandradodd.com/unschooling</A>

and for some more specific/particular issues, late reading, parenting issues,
<A HREF="http://sandradoddcom/life">http://sandradoddcom/life</A>



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
